product_name: Oakley Fast Jacket Interchangeable Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: The Oakley Fast Jacket sunglasses wrap your eyes in optically correct, distortion-free sun protection, with no-hassle lens swapping for maximum fun in a full spectrum of lighting. For easy lens swapping, Switchlock(TM) lens removal system relieves distortion-causing frame pressure by allowing the bottom part of the frame to pivot open. Optically correct polycarbonate lenses resist scratching and won't shatter. Iridium(R) gray-tinted lenses are ideal for bright light and direct sunshine. Reflective Iridium coating enhances optical clarity and contrast and reduces glare. Also includes a pair of interchangeable persimmon (amber-tinted) lenses to enhance depth perception and boost contrast in shade and under overcast skies. Oakley permanent lens coating sheds sweat, rain, dust and skin oils, preventing build-up and keeping your vision clear. Unique three-point fit includes optical alignment for sharp, accurate vision, impact absorption for improved protection, and geometry designed to enhance peripheral view. Nose pads and stem sleeves are made of hydrophilic rubber, which increases in tackiness as you perspire and holds eyewear in place as you move. Lightweight, flexible nylon frames resist damaging stresses. To preserve the superior optical quality, the Fast Jacket sunglasses come with a protective semi-rigid case.
short_description: The Oakley Fast Jacket sunglasses wrap your eyes in optically correct, distortion-free sun protection, with no-hassle lens swapping for maximum fun in a full spectrum of lighting.
